title: Preseason question
body: So tommorow (november 8th) is the season 7 updates coming, or any updates or do they happen season 7 start

replies.body:
We're rolling out the Season 2017 changes over time, but you'll have immediate access to the Flex Queue and later down the road Solo queue. You can read about what's planned for the new season in [this post.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season)

Let me know if you have any questions.
